title: One RP away from 975 PLS RIOT!!
body:
Hello riot I am currently standing at 974 rp exactly 1 rp away from getting scorched earth renekton, if by any chance you could be as nice as to provide me with it I would be so happy.
In exchange please accept this lovely artwork :)

https://imgur.com/Zb4vpgz

replies.body: It looks like they took a day off. Instead of reposting, I'd suggest being patient until they return! The poros aren't lazy and skip over things they missed - they actually go through and address these posts when they can. I'm sure they'll happily reward you with the RP you're asking for your art.
